com.stms.web

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stms.web.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User class for Student Time Management System Used to create new and edit existing user accounts in the database. Offers additional functionality such as login verfication.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User()
      Blank constructor used to create and insert new user accounts in the database.
      User(java.lang.String email)
      Parameterised constructor to create a user using their email.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User()
        Blank constructor used to create and insert new user accounts in the database.

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String email)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameterised constructor to create a user using their email. If an account with the provided email does not exist, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        email - the account email address of an existing user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String plaintext)
        Checks if the supplied password matches the hashed password in the database.
        Parameters:
        plaintext - the plaintext password to check
        Returns:
        true if the password matches, false otherwise

        Save the user's details to the database.
        Returns:
